message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a great opportunity to get a fantastic deal. I'm willing to sell it to you for $180.
I appreciate the offer, but $180 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $140 for the product. Let's see if we can find a middle ground.
I understand you're looking for a middle ground, but I still need to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer it to you for $160.
I appreciate the willingness to compromise, but $160 is still a bit high for me. I'm happy to go up to $150, which is fair for both of us.  Let's close this deal.

I'm not willing to go any lower than $160, but I'm willing to throw in some extras to sweeten the deal. I'll include a free accessory worth $20, so the total value you'll get is $180. I'll sell it to you for $170.
